name: Off The Grid (Stealth-ish game
description:
These Jerks have been harassing you since you left the friend group, being big meanie heads, can you get to the principal and avoid them? 

CONTROLS IN GAME

This was an excuse to make a game since I don't want to give myself a break, there is no love put into this, so please don't go in the comments and spam stuff about that this is a terrible game (I already know that, does not contribute to much)
